Key Match Events: South Africa led 1-0 but drew 1-1 with Congo-Brazzaville
Congo equalized on the stroke of halftime
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Congolese were impressive after their shambolic showing in South Africa a few days ago
Others: Bafana Bafana need one win from their final two matches of the qualifying campaign to secure passage to the next Afcon
Coach Hugo Broos trusted Khuliso Mudau and Teboho Mokoena despite their limited game time at club level
